metadata.title: CVE-2019-14864 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low
metadata.description:
Ansible, versions 2.9.x before 2.9.1, 2.8.x before 2.8.7 and Ansibleversions 2.7.x before 2.7.15, is not respecting the flag no_log set it toTrue when Sumologic and Splunk callback plugins are used send tasks resultsevents to collectors. This would discloses and collects any sensitive data.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14864` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ansible - 2.9.2+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ansible package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.9.2+dfsg-1').
